name: PHOBOS Project
description:
Face up to your deepest fears in PHOBOS Project, a nightmarish immersive game experience where your own phobia comes to life !

Phobos Project is a first-person adventure game exploring the depths of psychological horror. In this experiment you have to find a way out and keep your sanity level up through different hostile environments. Face your dread and try to find the source of the nightmare.

Explore the different levels and solve the puzzles to move forward.

Immerse yourself into creepy levels. From a wide dark forest to the oppressive streets of a city by night, you have to cross many dangers and find your way home.

Survive the many threats and monsters that lurk in the dark. Hide or run to prevent the program from crashing and endure the experiment.
